long_description: Ready to splash into the fun world of paddling? The Perception Sound 9.5 kayak with paddle gets you out on the water with value that's hard to beat. Extremely stable and easy to paddle, the Perception Sound 9.5 kayak is ideal if you're a beginner seeking leisurely afternoon voyages on flatwater and slow rivers. Roomy cockpit makes it easy to get in and out of the kayak; hull is designed to add stability when entering and exiting the boat. Soft yet supportive padded seating offers easy comfort; backrest is adjustable. Stern bungee stores bulky accessories, and molded tray in cockpit keeps track of small items. The Perception Sound 9.5 kayak features adjustable footbraces and a cup holder. Taking 1 step out of getting you to the water, this item includes a durable, double-bladed 7 ft. 5 in. (225cm) kayak paddle.
short_description: Ready to splash into the fun world of paddling? The Perception Sound 9.5 kayak with paddle gets you out on the water with value that's hard to beat.
